Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support as there is no actual footage or reliable sources reporting the shooting of the 11-year-old girl.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the media covered up the news of the shooting without providing any substantial evidence or proof.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that no news account or credible sources reported any such shooting at the Standing Rock protest site.
Understate: The claim may be understating the importance of verifying information and relying on official sources before spreading rumors or misinformation.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation provided by protest leaders and Facebook pages that deny the shooting incident, suggesting that the claim may be based on misinformation or false rumors.
